title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5303.12 - Issuance of a license or registration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5303.12 - Issuance of a license or registration

State Regulations
(a) The commission shall notify the human
resource department or other applicable department of the gaming facility
licensee in writing or via electronic communications when a license or
registration is granted. (b) Licenses and registrations issued by the commission are
nontransferable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5303.12

Adopted

New

Amended

New

York State Register October 12, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 41, eff. 10/12/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
